mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_notice( id, status, version, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, app_id, title, content, type, receive_scope, is_top, end_top_day, biz_mode, publish_time, effect_time, invalid_time, user_id, organ_id, is_record_read ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{status}, 0, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime}, #{appId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{type}, #{receiveScope}, #{isTop}, #{endTopDay}, #{bizMode}, #{publishTime}, #{effectTime}, #{invalidTime}, #{userId}, #{organId}, #{isRecordRead} )
